ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson follows Gargarax thru the portal and into his world, a world of demons.
Blue ends up in Jung-Dome and has his neural implant removed before the buttonmen who were hunting him show up.
Tharg explains how he tried to start a magazine in Atlantis.
A man arrives from the future and has a drink of scotch in the park with a man at a park bench.
Judge Dredd discovers the "ghost" bike riders are actually robots.
Micky Swift is sent back through the phone lines to explore the city and start the fight against the dark forces.
